text: John Wick (also known as John Wick: Chapter 1) is a 2014 American neo-noir action movie directed by Chad Stahelski, in his directorial debut, and written by Derek Kolstad. It stars Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Adrianne Palicki, Bridget Moynahan, Dean Winters, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, and Willem Dafoe. It is the first movie in the John Wick movie series. The movie received positive reviews. Many critics called it one of Reeves' best performances and one of the best action movies of 2014. It made $86 million worldwide. ==Other websites== * Category:2014 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies directed by Chad Stahelski Category:John Wick movies
title: John Wick (movie)
